text_block_list.text:
I'm waiting for Sky to show up so we<n>can start training,
but...
Chatter, chatter...

Maybe it's because the academy's<n>big Tracen Meet is
coming up, but the<n>track is jam-packed with students.

I can already see Sky skipping<n>practice with an excuse like,
"There's<n>no point if I can't run my best."

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Trainer, hello!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
It's a fine day for training! I'm<n>practically shaking with
excitement at<n>the thought of running!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Whoa, your trainee came all the wayhere and that's your reaction?Now I'm sad... I thought you'd behappy.
choice_data_list: I totally thought you would skip today.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Nah, even I wouldn't skip training<n>with our next race coming
up so soon.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Actually, I'm feeling great today! I'm<n>itching for a good run!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: And with that, I'm off to get started!<n>Oh, and before I forget...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Keep your eyes on me, okay? I'm<n>expecting a nice reward
for my<n>efforts.
True to her word, Sky sprints toward<n>the track energetically.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Hey hey, got a minute?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
The track's real crowded today, so<n>you mind if I join you
for some<n>running?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Sure, no problem. Finding a spot<n>today can be pretty rough,
after all.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Okay, next—ah.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me. Do you mind if I join you<n>until another spot
opens up?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: I guess that's fine. Let's get running,<n>then.

The usually secretive Sky is going up<n>to others and joining
them for partner<n>running out of her own volition.

What's more, everyone she's gone<n>up to are also her
opponents in her<n>upcoming race.
Wait... is she running with them to<n>gather intel? Then...
choice_data_list: There's something I should be doing, too!
There's something I should be doing, too!

text_block_list.text:
Not wanting Sky's efforts to go in<n>vain, I decide to put in my
own share<n>of hard work as well.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Whew... How did I do in today's<n>training? I'd say I did
pretty well<n>considering how crowded it was,<n>don't you
think?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Anyways, it'd be nice if I got<n>rewarded for my hard work.
Maybe<n>some time... right about now.
choice_data_list: Nice work out there. Here's your reward.
Nice work out there. Here's your reward.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Oooh, what are these notes? Let's<n>see here...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
"The first person you ran with is<n>easily swayed by her
emotions and<n>has a bad habit of getting rushed."

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
"The second person isn't good at<n>running when someone is
marking her<n>from behind."

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Hmm... I see, I see. You did well<n>preparing this reward for
me while I<n>was running.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Yup, it's perfect. Nobody gets me like<n>you do.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Thanks to this reward, our bond has<n>leveled up again.
Da-dada-daaah! ♪

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
At this rate, I might be able to reel in<n>the big one at my next
race... Just<n>kidding.

Seemingly satisfied with my present,<n>Sky continues to
swipe back and forth<n>through my notes.
